byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The messaging app company, based in Canada, said it that after several approaches from suitors, it hired Qatalyst Partners for help.

headline.main: Kik Interactive Says It’s Weighing Options, Including Selling Itself
headline.print_headline: Kik Interactive Says It’s Weighing Options, Including Selling Itself

snippet: The messaging app company, based in Canada, said it that after several approaches from suitors, it hired Qatalyst Partners for help.
